message.original: 行方をくらませたレオを追い 第三のアークに向かう
message.translation: Go after Leo who has disappeared and is heading for the Third Ark

message.original: 第三のアークに向かうため神殿の港で船を調達する
message.translation: Procure a ship in the Temple's harbor to go to the Third Ark

message.original: 準備を整え船で第三のアークへ向かう
message.translation: Prepare and head to the Third Ark by ship

message.original: 第三のアークを探索しゲルトを見つける
message.translation: Seek out Gerd in the Third Ark

message.original: アークの最深部へ向かう
message.translation: Head to the deepest part of the Ark

message.original: 謁見の間のジョゼフに経緯を報告する
message.translation: Report back to Joseph in the Audience Chamber
